title: How To | Cover A Pimple
description:
If a pimple shows up suddenly you’ll want to follow these steps using our SkinClearing® Blemish Concealer for coverage and to quickly reduce the blemish for clearer- looking skin.

Step 1: Apply concealer with salicylic acid to the center of the pimple, using the tip of your concealer pen.

Step 2: Stipple the concealer outward.

Step 3: For larger pimples, repeat steps 1 and 2 until you have reached desired coverage.

Step 4: Once the red spot has been completely covered, lightly dust over it with a translucent powder to set the concealer in place.

Remember, don’t touch the pimple. Follow our ‘How To’ series for more everyday makeup tips!
